pageContext.claim: “As a Republican I'm doing very well with African-Americans and with the vote with the -- in polls and everything.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump since before his election and throughout his presidency has polled dismally among African Americans, winning a meager 8 percent of the black vote in 2016. In January 2020, a Washington Post-Ipsos {poll} found that 79 percent of African American adults said it was personally important to them that Trump not win a second term; 83 percent said Trump was racist.
